page.title: 14BELMONT WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The Women's Institute uses Belmont School as a{meeting}place on the first Wednesday of every month.Speakers come and talk about various subjects.An annual dinner is held on the W.I.'s birthday in June.At Christmas they have a party and {entertainment.}Every other summer a craft and produce show is held,at which there are{competitions}for the best vegetables or flowers.When the produce has been judged it is sold.This year they are giving money to the women on the Seychelles Islands for material for clothes and handicrafts.Every year three of the women from the W.I. go to the Denman College in Cambridgeshire to learn {handicrafts.}The Belmont W.I. has 41 members, ten of whom serve on the comittee.
